{{Lang|'''Fujita'''|ja=藤田|ja_rm=Fujita}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|Shuumatsuban Operations}}. He may be killed if the [[Traveler]] chooses to reveal that they are related to the [[Shuumatsuban]]. His real identity is a [[Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer]].
